      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point2D FarthestPair.either()
      Returns one of the points in the farthest pair of points.
      Point2D ClosestPair.either()
      Returns one of the points in the closest pair of points.

      Returns the other point in the farthest pair of points.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Comparator<Point2D> Point2D.atan2Order()
      Compares two points by atan2() angle (between –π and π) with respect to this point.

      Compares two points by distance to this point.
      java.util.Comparator<Point2D> Point2D.polarOrder()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Point2D.area2(Point2D a, Point2D b, Point2D c)
      Returns twice the signed area of the triangle a-b-c.
      static int Point2D.ccw(Point2D a, Point2D b, Point2D c)
      Returns true if a→b→c is a counterclockwise turn.
      int Point2D.compareTo(Point2D that)
      Compares two points by y-coordinate, breaking ties by x-coordinate.
      double Point2D.distanceSquaredTo(Point2D that)
      Returns the square of the Euclidean distance between this point and that point.
      double Point2D.distanceTo(Point2D that)
      Returns the Euclidean distance between this point and that point.
